TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EntityDataSource extends System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl implements class System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource, class System.Web.UI.IDataSource, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.IQueryableDataSource
Public Class EntityDataSource Inherits DataSourceControl Implements IDynamicDataSource, IQueryableDataSource

summary.span: 表示 ASP.NET 應用程式中資料繫結控制項的實體資料模型 (EDM)。

span.span: Represents an Entity Data Model (EDM) to data-bound controls in an ASP.NET application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 您可以使用以及擷取 EDM 中的資料，並且將顯示、 編輯和使用少量或沒有程式碼來排序資料，在網頁上的資料繫結控制項的控制項。You can use the control together with a data-bound control to retrieve data from an EDM and to display, edit, and sort data on a Web page by using little or no code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[EntityDataSource Web 伺服器控制項概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1f09af00-9578-4744-a029-765710a3c83f)。For more information, see [EntityDataSource Web Server Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1f09af00-9578-4744-a029-765710a3c83f). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ```

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: An to the Entity Data Model (EDM).

summary.span: 使用所提供的連接，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the provided connection.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoGenerateOrderByClause { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 控制項是否會根據 集合中的值，動態建立 ORDER BY 子句。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control dynamically creates an ORDER BY clause based on values in the collection.

value.span: 如果 控制項會建立 ORDER BY 子句，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the control creates the ORDER BY clause; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性控制設為 `true`，控制項自動產生 ORDER BY 子句中的參數從指派給屬性。When the property of the control is set to `true`, the control automatically generates an ORDER BY clause from the parameter in the assigned to the property. 這就不需要明確地指派至 ORDER BY 子句屬性。This eliminates the need to explicitly assign an ORDER BY clause to the property. 如果您設定屬性`true`，您不應明確指派值給屬性。If you set the property to `true`, you should not explicitly assign a value to the property. ## Examples 下列範例會自動產生 ORDER BY 子句，並會使用值`OrderByDropDownList`設定參數的值。The following example automatically generates the ORDER BY clause and uses the value of the `OrderByDropDownList` to set the value of the parameter. ``` ``` 下列範例會自動產生 ORDER BY 子句，並使用`DefaultValue`屬性`Parameter`項目來設定參數的值。The following example automatically generates the ORDER BY clause and uses the `DefaultValue` attribute of the `Parameter` element to set the value of the parameter. ``` ```

exception.span: 當 屬性設定為 且 屬性不是 Null 時。

span.span: When the property is set to and the property is not null.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoGenerateWhereClause { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指出 控制項是否根據 集合中所定義的值動態建立 WHERE 子句。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control dynamically creates a WHERE clause based on values defined in the collection.

value.span: 如果 控制項要建立 WHERE 子句，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control creates the WHERE clause; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要篩選查詢結果納入方程式實體類型屬性的運算式，您可以使用屬性。To filter query results by equating an entity type property to an expression, you can use the property. 當屬性控制設為 `true`，控制項自動產生`WHERE`子句中的參數從的屬性。When the property of the control is set to `true`, the control automatically generates a `WHERE` clause from the parameters in the of the property. 每個參數的屬性必須符合包含在查詢結果的實體類型屬性名稱。The property of each parameter has to match an entity type property name that is included in the query results. 如果您設定屬性`true`，您應該明確地指派`WHERE`子句屬性。If you set the property to `true`, you should not explicitly assign a `WHERE` clause to the property. ## 範例Example 在下列範例中屬性設定為`true`。In the following example the property is set to `true`. 因此，的屬性必須符合包含在查詢結果的實體類型屬性名稱。Therefore, the of the property has to match an entity type property name that is included in the query results. 查詢會選取 SalesOrderID 和 TotalDue SalesOrderHeader 實體類型的屬性。The query selects the SalesOrderID and TotalDue properties of the SalesOrderHeader entity type. 自動產生`WHERE`子句會藉由比較 TotalDue 值 TotalDueList 清單方塊控制項中選取值篩選查詢結果。The automatically generated `WHERE` clause will filter the query results by comparing the TotalDue value to a value selected in the TotalDueList list box control. ``` ``` ## 範例Example 預設的情況下， 屬性設定為 `false`。By default, the property is set to `false`. 這表示我們必須提供`WHERE`子句。This means that we have to supply the `WHERE` clause. 在下列範例中，`WHERE`子句是`Where="it.TotalDue < @totalDueParam"`totalDueParam 且參數名稱。In the following example, the `WHERE` clause is `Where="it.TotalDue < @totalDueParam"` and totalDueParam is the parameter name. ``` ```

exception.span: 當 屬性設定為 且 屬性不是 Null 時。

span.span: When the property is set to and the property is not null.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoPage { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 控制項是否支援在執行階段完整瀏覽資料的區段。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control supports navigation through sections of the data at run time.

value.span: 如果使用者可以分頁瀏覽資料，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the user can page through the data; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項支援自動查詢所傳回的資料進行分頁。The control supports automatically paging through the data returned by queries. 屬性是布林值屬性，指出是否啟用繫結至資料控制項的查詢所傳回的資料分頁。The property is a Boolean property that indicates whether paging is enabled for data that is returned by queries bound to data controls. 當這個屬性設定為`true`、控制項新增至適當的查詢產生器方法根據資訊提供給資料繫結控制項。When this property is set to `true`, the control adds the appropriate query builder methods to the based on the information supplied to the by the data-bound control. 值屬性會決定是否屬性支援資料來源的控制項是`true`或`false`。The value of the property determines whether the property of the control that supports the data source is `true` or `false`. 當您定義投影啟用分頁時，您必須定義排序結果所依據的屬性。When you define a projection with paging enabled, you must define the property by which to order the results. 這表示當您設定屬性來定義投影，並讓設`true`，您也必須設定屬性來定義的順序，或設定屬性`true`並加入訂單依參數集合。This means that when you set the property to define a projection and have set to `true`, you must also set the property to define the order or set the property to `true` and add an ORDER BY parameter to the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoSort { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 控制項是否支援在執行階段排序資料。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control supports sorting the data at run time.

value.span: 如果使用者可以排序資料，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the user can sort the data; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項支援自動排序查詢所傳回的資料。The control supports automatically sorting the data returned by queries. 屬性控制項是布林值的屬性，指出是否啟用繫結至資料控制項的查詢所傳回之資料的排序。The property of the control is a Boolean property that indicates whether sorting is enabled for data that is returned by queries that are bound to data controls. 當這個屬性設定為`true`、控制項新增至適當的查詢產生器方法根據資訊提供給資料繫結控制項。When this property is set to `true`, the control adds the appropriate query builder methods to the based on the information supplied to the by the data-bound control. 值屬性會決定是否和屬性支援資料來源的控制項是`true`或`false`。The value of the property determines whether the and properties of the control that supports the data source is `true` or `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CommandParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 取得查詢的參數集合。

span.span: Gets the parameter collection for the query.

value.span: ，包含傳遞至查詢命令的參數。

span.span: A that contains the parameters that are passed to the query command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來存取參數傳遞至使用指定的明確 Entity SQL 查詢的屬性。The property is used to access the of parameters that are passed to an explicit Entity SQL query that is specified using the property. ## Examples 下列範例會提供傳回 Product 物件的集合的 Entity SQL 命令文字。The following example supplies Entity SQL command text that returns a collection of Product objects. ``` ``` 下列範例會傳回一連串預計的資料行：The following example returns a projected series of columns: ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CommandText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定定義查詢的 Entity SQL 命令。

span.span: Gets or sets an Entity SQL command that defines the query.

value.span: 本身為 Entity SQL 查詢的 值。

span.span: A value that is the Entity SQL query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性控制項可讓您指定使用自訂的 Entity SQL 運算式的查詢。The property of the control enables you to specify a query that uses a custom Entity SQL expression. 類似的 SELECT 陳述式，建立不是可更新的原始資料的預測。Like the SELECT statement, creates a projection of the original data that is not updatable. 當屬性指派，請停用更新、 插入和刪除功能。When the property is assigned, update, insert, and delete functionalities are disabled. 在此情況下，方法， ，和將相關控制所有傳回`false`。In this case, the methods , , and of the related control all return `false`. 當屬性設定，則擲回例外狀況時資料繫結至控制項所呼叫方法控制如果的值， ，或設`true`。When the property is set, an exception is thrown when the method is called by a control that is data bound to an control if the value of , , or is set to `true`. 如果設為投影的屬性會傳回查詢 (比方說，「`SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`")、會傳回。If the is set to a query that returns a projection of properties (for example, "`SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`"), a will be returned. ## Examples 下列範例會使用提供的 Entity SQL 命令，來傳回 Product 物件的集合。The following example uses the supplied Entity SQL command to returns a collection of Product objects. ``` ``` 下列範例會傳回一連串預計的資料行：The following example returns a projected series of columns: ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ConnectionString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用來執行查詢的連接字串。

span.span: Gets or sets the connection string that is used to execute the query.

value.span: 用於查詢的連接字串。

span.span: The connection string for the query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以從具名的 EDM 連接字串儲存在應用程式組態檔的項目中初始化控制項。The property of the control can be initialized from a named EDM connection string stored in the element of the application configuration file. 使用實體資料模型精靈建立 EDM 時，應用程式組態檔中建立具名的 EDM 連接。When the EDM is created by using the Entity Data Model Wizard, a named EDM connection is created in the application configuration file. 當應用程式組態檔中找到具名的 EDM 連接字串時，連線就會顯示為 EntityDataSource 設計工具中設定資料來源精靈的選項。When a named EDM connection string is found in the application configuration file, the connection is visible as an option in the Configure Data Source wizard of the EntityDataSource designer. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[設定資料來源精靈 （EntityDataSource 控制項）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/263976a5-2406-47c0-8919-c6af6e76d78e)。For more information, see [Configure Data Source Wizard (EntityDataSource Control)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/263976a5-2406-47c0-8919-c6af6e76d78e). 如果未指定屬性中，同時和屬性必須設定為要建立的控制項。If the property is not specified, both the and properties must be set for the control to create the .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ContextCreated As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceContextCreatedEventArgs)

summary.span: 當 已完成建立用於搭配實體資料物件使用的 時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the has finished creating the that is used to work with entity data objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理這個事件來存取，會由執行查詢及追蹤變更的控制項。Handle this event to access the that is used by the control to execute the query and track changes. 這個內容物件可儲存及用於後續作業外。This context object can be stored and used for successive operations outside the . 取自所傳回事件。The is obtained from the that is returned by the event. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[物件內容生命週期管理 (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160)。For more information, see [Object Context Life-Cycle Management (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160). 如需有關物件內容的詳細資訊，請參閱[識別解析、 狀態管理和變更追蹤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0)。For more information about the object context, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0). 事件可讓您指派，已建立的變數之外的後續作業以。The event allows you to assign the that has been created to a variable for successive operations outside the . 屬性包含已在中建立的內容事件。The property contains the context that has been created in the event. 如果使用者不能指派期間的內容事件中包含的內容執行個體是由一個根據， ，或屬性。If the user does not assign a context during the event, the context instance contained in is the one created by the based on the , , or properties.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ContextCreating As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs)

summary.span: 發生於 建立用來搭配實體資料物件運作的 時。

span.span: Occurs when the creates the that is used to work with entity data objects.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ContextDisposing As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceContextDisposingEventArgs)

summary.span: 發生於處置 之前。

span.span: Occurs before an is disposed of.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理這個事件以防止供正在處置的控制項。Handle this event to prevent the used by the control from being disposed of. 這樣做，當您想要使用單一中您的頁面數個控制項或執行個體的執行個體控制項。Do this when you want to use a single instance in your page with several controls or instances of the control. 若要避免從正在處置，設定屬性物件`true`。To prevent the from being disposed of, set the property of the object to `true`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[物件內容生命週期管理 (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160)。For more information, see [Object Context Life-Cycle Management (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160). 如需有關物件內容的詳細資訊，請參閱[識別解析、 狀態管理和變更追蹤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0)。For more information about the object context, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0). ## Examples 若要保留的現有日後參考取消 5d; 的執行個體成員事件，如下列程式碼所示。To keep an existing instance member for future reference cancel the event as shown by the following code. ```csharp protected void EntityDataSource2_ContextDisposing(object sender, EntityDataSourceContextDisposingEventArgs e) { e.Cancel = true; } ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Type ^ ContextType { Type ^ get(); void set(Type ^ value); };

span.span: Gets or sets the typed used by the control.

value.span: 衍生自 的物件。

span.span: An object that derives from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 供控制可以存取從屬性。The used by the control can be accessed from the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[物件內容生命週期管理 (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160)。For more information, see [Object Context Life-Cycle Management (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ContextTypeName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

value.span: ，表示該型別的完整限定名稱。

span.span: A that is the fully qualified name of the type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性控制項是指定具類型的完整限定的類型名稱的字串，會由控制項。The property of the control is a string that specifies the fully qualified type name of the typed that is used by the control. 如果未指定屬性中，同時和屬性必須設定為要建立的控制項。If the property is not specified, both the and properties must be set for the control to create the .

Protected Overridable Function CreateView () As EntityDataSourceView

returns.span: 做為資料繫結控制項介面的物件。

span.span: An object that acts as the interface for data-bound controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要提供自訂的檢視，您可以覆寫這個方法在衍生類別中。To provide a custom view, you can override this method in a derived class.

value.span: ，它是預設容器名稱。

span.span: A that is the default container name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定屬性中，同時和屬性必須設定為要建立的控制項。If the property is not specified, both the and properties must be set for the control to create the .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Deleted As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs)

summary.span: 發生於物件從資料來源中刪除之後。

span.span: Occurs after an object has been deleted from the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後引發事件方法被成功呼叫上刪除的物件。The event is raised after the method has just been successfully called on the to delete an object. 屬性物件用來存取已刪除的物件。The property of the object is used to access the deleted object. 此物件是處於狀態。This object is in a state. 刪除物件時，發生錯誤時引發事件時，屬性物件設為所傳回，而屬性設定為`null`。If an error occurs when an object is deleted, the event is raised, the property of the object is set to the returned , and the property is set to `null`. 如果您在處理中的例外狀況事件處理常式中，設定屬性`true`。If you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 這可防止再次引發的例外狀況。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 當您指定的值`false`如屬性，重新引發例外狀況。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DeleteParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 取得刪除作業期間所使用的參數集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that are used during a delete operation.

value.span: 刪除作業期間所使用的參數。

span.span: The parameters that are used during a delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 4 或更早版本為目標的 web 應用程式，屬性值會儲存在檢視狀態，並自動回傳之間維護。For web applications that target ASP.NET 4 or earlier, the property value is stored in view state and is automatically maintained between postbacks. ASP.NET 4.5 為目標的 web 應用程式，屬性值不會儲存檢視狀態中，您必須設定每個 HTTP 要求值。For web applications that target ASP.NET 4.5, the property value is not stored in view state, and you must set the value for each HTTP request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Deleting As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs)

summary.span: 發生於物件從資料來源中刪除之前。

span.span: Occurs before an object is deleted from the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前引發事件上呼叫方法刪除的物件。The event is raised before the method is called on the to delete an object. 屬性物件用來存取要刪除的物件。The property of the object is used to access the object to be deleted. 此物件的屬性可能未完全設定。The properties of this object may not be fully set. 必須設定只能識別此物件所需的屬性。Only the properties required to identify the object must be set. 若要停止刪除物件，設定屬性物件`true`。To stop the object from being deleted, set the property of the object to `true`. 如果發生錯誤時刪除的物件，準備就會引發事件和屬性物件設為所傳回。If an error occurs when preparing to delete an object, the event is raised and the property of the object is set to the returned . 當您處理中的例外狀況事件處理常式中，設定屬性`true`。When you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 這可防止再次引發的例外狀況。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 當您指定的值`false`如屬性，重新引發例外狀況。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableDelete { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指出是否可以透過 控制項刪除物件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether objects can be deleted through the control.

value.span: 如果已啟用自動刪除作業則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if automatic delete operations are enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果無法設定屬性已啟用。 cannot be set if the property is enabled. A`false`值指派給屬性強制將相關的屬性要傳回物件`false`。A `false` value assigned to the property on the forces the property of the related object to return `false`. 當屬性設定為`false`、如果資料繫結控制項呼叫就會引發方法。When the property is set to `false`, a is raised if the data-bound control calls the method on the . 如果任何一個可更新性條件，則不符合而屬性設定為`true`、引發例外狀況。If any of the conditions for updatability are not met and the property is set to `true`, the raises an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableFlattening { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示您是否要關閉建立包裝函式。

span.span: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether you want to turn off wrapper creation.

value.span: 如果要將屬性簡維則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the properties will be flattened; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您初始化控制項使用屬性，包裝在結果中的物件中的每個實體執行個體型別。When you initialize the control by using the property, the wraps each entity instance in the results in an object of the type. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[簡維物件 (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08a30ef3-1132-4ac4-856c-5ed3d65eaf16)。For more information, see [Flattening Objects (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/08a30ef3-1132-4ac4-856c-5ed3d65eaf16).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableInsert { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指出是否可以透過 控制項加入物件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether objects can be added through the control.

value.span: 如果已啟用自動插入作業則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if automatic insert operations are enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果無法設定屬性設定為`true`。 cannot be set if the property is set to `true`. A`false`值指派給屬性強制將相關的屬性要傳回物件`false`。A `false` value assigned to the property on the forces the property of the related object to return `false`. 當屬性設定為`false`、如果資料繫結控制項呼叫就會引發方法。When the property is set to `false`, a is raised if the data-bound control calls the method on the . 如果任何一個可更新性條件，則不符合而屬性設定為`true`、引發例外狀況。If any of the conditions for updatability are not met and the property is set to `true`, the raises an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableUpdate { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指出是否可以透過 控制項修改物件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether objects can be modified through the control.

value.span: 如果已啟用自動更新作業則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if automatic update operations are enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果無法設定屬性設定為`true`。 cannot be set if the property is set to `true`. A`false`值指派給屬性強制將相關的屬性要傳回物件`false`。A `false` value assigned to the property forces the property of the related object to return `false`. 當屬性設定為`false`、如果資料繫結控制項呼叫就會引發方法。When the property is set to `false`, a is raised if the data-bound control calls the method on the . 設定屬性`true`不保證可更新性。Setting the property to `true` does not guarantee updatability. 如果任何一個可更新性條件，則不符合而屬性設定為`true`、引發例外狀況。If any of the conditions for updatability are not met and the property is set to `true`, the raises an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ EntitySetName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定由 控制項使用之實體集的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the entity set used by the control.

value.span: 實體集名稱。

span.span: The entity set name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性控制項用來指定控制項所存取的物件類型的實體集。The property of the control is used to specify the entity set of the type of the objects that are accessed by the control. 值屬性是預設的選取陳述式所使用的控制項。The value of the property is the default SELECT statement that is used by the control. 如果設定為不必要的查詢會指定為 Entity SQL 運算式是提供給屬性。The setting is not required if the query is specified as an Entity SQL expression that is supplied to the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[自訂命令文字 (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d42e90d0-1443-474e-8940-53f504d6fc91)。For more information, see [Custom Command Text (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d42e90d0-1443-474e-8940-53f504d6fc91).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ EntityTypeFilter { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定運算式，此運算式會將查詢限於使用特定衍生型別 (Derived Type) 的結果。

span.span: Gets or sets the expression that limits the query to only results of a specific derived type.

value.span: 篩選條件運算式。

span.span: The filter expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項必須傳回特定的衍生型別，屬性必須也設定為指定此衍生型別的名稱。When the control must return a specific derived type, the property must also be set to specify the name of this derived type. 如果屬性會指定實體集可能會產生多型結果，屬性是否需要進行編輯的資料。If the property specifies an entity set that can generate polymorphic results, the property is required to be able to edit data. 這會有相同的效果套用方法。This has the same effect as applying the method to the . 如果資料繫結是唯讀的則不是必要屬性。If the data binding is read-only, then the property is not required. 在此情況下，將會是預設實體類型之實體集之查詢所傳回之物件的屬性。In this case, the properties of the object returned by the query will be those of the default entity type for the entity set.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.DataSourceView GetView(string viewName) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetView (viewName As String) As DataSourceView

param.name: viewName

span.span: The name of the view to retrieve.

param.span: 因為 控制項只支援一個檢視，所以會忽略viewName。

span.span: Because the control supports only one view, viewName is ignored.

summary.span: 取得與資料來源控制項相關聯的具名資料來源檢視。

span.span: Gets the named data source view that is associated with the data source control.
The that is associated with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項支援只有一個資料來源檢視。The control supports only one data source view. 就像所有的資料來源檢視物件，定義其功能與資料來源控制項相關聯的物件時，會執行所有的工作是為了從基礎資料庫中，擷取資料並執行作業，例如排序，插入、 刪除和更新。Like all data source view objects, the object that is associated with the data source control defines its capabilities, performs all work that is necessary to retrieve data from the underlying database, and performs operations, such as sorting, inserting, deleting, and updating.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Collections.ICollection GetViewNames() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetViewNames () As ICollection

summary.span: 取得名稱集合，表示與 控制項相關聯的檢視物件清單。

span.span: Gets a collection of names representing the list of view objects that are associated with the control.

returns.span: ，包含與 控制項相關聯之檢視的名稱。

span.span: An that contains the names of the views associated with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項只支援一個檢視其基礎資料。The control supports only one view on its underlying data. 方法會傳回此一檢視名稱的單一項目集合，做為字串。The method returns a single-element collection of this one-view name as a string.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ GroupBy { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 Entity SQL 運算式，這個運算式會指定如何將查詢結果分組。

span.span: Gets or sets the Entity SQL expression that specifies how to group the query results.

value.span: GROUP BY 子句。

span.span: The GROUP BY clause.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Include { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定運算式，這個運算式會指定要包含在查詢結果中的相關物件。

span.span: Gets or sets the expression that specifies the related objects to include in the query results.

value.span: 查詢結果中所傳回之查詢路徑的逗號分隔清單。

span.span: Comma-separated list of query paths to return in the query results.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性控制項指定查詢路徑定義以及特別是查詢的物件傳回的物件 thatare 的逗號分隔清單。The property of the control specifies a comma-separated list of query paths that define the objects thatare returned together with the specifically queried object. 傳遞字串中每個以逗號分隔的值，而不需修改，為個別呼叫方法執行由[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]。Each comma-separated value in the string is passed, without modification, as a separate call to the method of an that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]. 此查詢是藉由調節資料的來源控制項。This query is the source of the data regulated by the control. 屬性是套用至引數執行前。The property is the argument applied to the before it is executed. 若要提供字串屬性使用相同的格式為傳遞給字串方法。The string supplied to the property uses the same format as the string that is passed to the method of . 如需如何使用查詢路徑以自動載入相關的物件的範例，請參閱[How to： 使用圖形結果的查詢路徑](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/100bf7f5-00ba-4c17-8e27-7a8a14831093)。For examples of how to use query paths to automatically load related objects, see [How to: Use Query Paths to Shape Results](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/100bf7f5-00ba-4c17-8e27-7a8a14831093). 當屬性用來指定查詢路徑中，相關實體的屬性只可以用於唯讀資料繫結。When the property is used to specify query paths, the properties of the related entities can only be used for read-only data-binding. 如果相關的物件沒有明確包含在查詢路徑中，屬性描述元是否仍然可供資料繫結，但屬性本身會傳回 null 值。If related objects are not explicitly included in the query path, the property descriptors are still available for data binding, but the properties themselves return null values. 在此情況下，您必須明確地以顯示其值載入相關的物件。In this case, the related objects must be explicitly loaded to display their values. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[載入相關物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1). ## Examples 下列的 XML 標記會定義查詢路徑會傳回`SalesOrderHeader`所傳回的物件與相關`Contact`物件。The following XML markup defines a query path that returns `SalesOrderHeader` objects related to the returned `Contact` object. 與每個`SalesOrderHeader`，相關`SalesOrderDetail`和`Address`也會傳回物件。With each `SalesOrderHeader`, the related `SalesOrderDetail` and `Address` objects are also returned. ``` ``` 上述 XML 範例等同於下列名為`customers`:The previous XML example is the same as the following named `customers`: ``` ObjectQuery customers = context.Contact .Where("it.ContactID = @ContactID", new ObjectParameter("ContactID", customerId)) .Include("SalesOrderHeader.SalesOrderDetail") .Include("SalesOrderHeader.Address"); ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Inserted As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs)

summary.span: 發生於在資料來源位置建立新物件之後。

span.span: Occurs after a new object is created at the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加入的物件建立資料來源中時，或將物件資料保存到資料來源時，發生錯誤，會引發事件。The event is raised when the added object is created in the data source or if an error has occurred when the object data is persisted to the data source. 屬性物件用來存取已加入的物件。The property of the object is used to access the added object. 此物件的屬性會包含從資料來源，包括任何與資料來源產生的值傳回的值。The properties of this object contain values that are returned from the data source, including any data source-generated values. 如果發生錯誤時將物件保存到資料來源，就會引發事件和屬性物件設為所傳回。If an error occurs when an object is persisted to the data source, the event is raised and the property of the object is set to the returned . 如果您在處理中的例外狀況事件處理常式中，設定屬性`true`。If you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 這可防止再次引發的例外狀況。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 當您指定的值`false`如屬性，重新引發例外狀況。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Inserting As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs)

summary.span: 發生於新物件保存至資料來源之前。

span.span: Occurs before a new object is persisted to the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新物件會保存到資料來源之前，就會引發事件。The event is raised before a new object is persisted to the data source. 事件可讓您修改或確認要加入之物件、 新增不同的物件，或取消作業。The event enables you to modify or verify the object being added, add a different object, or cancel the operation. 您可以存取的物件加入從屬性物件。You can access the object to be added from the property of the object. 如果提供不同的物件，使用者會負責設定正確的實體類型屬性。If supplying a different object, the user is responsible for setting the correct entity type in the property. 若要停止從所加入的物件，設定屬性物件`true`。To stop the object from being added, set the property of the object to `true`. 如果發生錯誤時建立新的物件，就會引發事件和屬性物件設為所傳回。If an error occurs when creating a new object, the event is raised and the property of the object is set to the returned . 當您處理中的例外狀況事件處理常式中，設定屬性`true`。When you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 這可防止再次引發的例外狀況。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 當您指定的值`false`如屬性，重新引發例外狀況。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InsertParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 取得插入作業期間所使用的參數集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that are used during an insert operation.

value.span: 插入作業期間所使用的參數。

span.span: The parameters that are used during an insert operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 4 或更早版本為目標的 web 應用程式，屬性值會儲存在檢視狀態，並自動回傳之間維護。For web applications that target ASP.NET 4 or earlier, the property value is stored in view state and is automatically maintained between postbacks. ASP.NET 4.5 為目標的 web 應用程式，屬性值不會儲存檢視狀態中，您必須設定每個 HTTP 要求值。For web applications that target ASP.NET 4.5, the property value is not stored in view state, and you must set the value for each HTTP request.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void LoadControlState(object savedState) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub LoadControlState (savedState As Object)

span.span: The that contains state information.

summary.span: 載入 控制項中需要保存的屬性狀態。

span.span: Loads the state of the properties in the control that need to be persisted.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnInit(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnInit (e As EventArgs)

span.span: An object that contains event data.

summary.span: 將 事件處理常式加入包含 控制項的 控制項。

span.span: Adds a event handler to the control that contains the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnUnload(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnUnload (e As EventArgs)

span.span: An object that contains event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ OrderBy { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 Entity SQL 運算式，這個運算式會指定如何排列查詢結果。

span.span: Gets or sets the Entity SQL expression that specifies how to order the query results.

value.span: ORDER BY 子句。

span.span: The ORDER BY clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性控制項是一個字串，代表 Entity SQL 查詢的運算式。The property of the control is a string that represents an expression of an Entity SQL query. 這個字串會傳遞，而不需修改，為執行由[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]。This string is passed, without modification, to an that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]. 此查詢是藉由調節資料的來源控制項。This query is the source of the data regulated by the control. 若要提供字串屬性使用相同的格式為傳遞給字串方法。The string supplied to the property uses the same format as the string that is passed to the method of . 如需如何使用子句來排序查詢結果的範例，請參閱[如何： 排序資料](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c05f2506-cb9d-4ebc-822b-300042ad53e7)。For examples of how to use the clause to order query results, see [How to: Sort Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c05f2506-cb9d-4ebc-822b-300042ad53e7). ## Examples XML 標記，在下列範例中，在.aspx 檔案中，從控制項擷取值，並將其傳遞為參數，以屬性。The XML markup in the following example, in an .aspx file, retrieves a value from a control and passes it as a parameter to the property. ``` ``` 上述 XML 範例相當於下列名為`onlineOrders`:The previous XML example is equivalent to the following named `onlineOrders`: ``` ObjectQuery onlineOrders = context.SalesOrderHeader .Where("it.OnlineOrderFlag = TRUE AND it.TotalDue > @ordercost", new ObjectParameter("ordercost", orderCost)) .OrderBy("it.TotalDue DESC"); ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OrderByParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 取得用於建立 ORDER BY 子句的參數集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that are used to create the ORDER BY clause.

value.span: 用來建立 ORDER BY 子句的參數。

span.span: The parameters that are used for creating the ORDER BY clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性控制設為 `true`，控制項自動產生 ORDER BY 子句中的參數從指派給屬性。When the property of the control is set to `true`, the control automatically generates an ORDER BY clause from the parameter in the assigned to the property. 這就不需要明確地指派至 ORDER BY 子句屬性。This eliminates the need to explicitly assign an ORDER BY clause to the property. ORDER BY 子句，從建構屬性需要參數集合中屬性的識別從查詢傳回之項目的單一屬性。The construction of the ORDER BY clause from the property requires that the property of the parameter in the collection identifies a single property of the item that is returned from the query. ## Examples 下列範例會自動產生 ORDER BY 子句，並會使用值`orderByDropDownList`設定參數的值。The following example automatically generates the ORDER BY clause and uses the value of the `orderByDropDownList` to set the value of the parameter. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event QueryCreated As EventHandler(Of QueryCreatedEventArgs)

summary.span: 在 建立 Entity SQL 查詢 ( 控制項的組態期間指定的查詢) 後發生。

span.span: Occurs after the creates an Entity SQL query that was specified during the configuration of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[套用 LINQ 查詢以 EntityDataSource](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cb70db56-9f9d-4b79-98fe-f03dd5ad1e38)。For more information, see [Applying LINQ Queries to EntityDataSource](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cb70db56-9f9d-4b79-98fe-f03dd5ad1e38).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance object SaveControlState() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function SaveControlState () As Object

summary.span: 儲存 控制項中需要保存的屬性狀態。

span.span: Saves the state of the properties in the control that need to be persisted.
The that contains state information.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Select { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定投影，以定義要包含在查詢結果中的屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets the projection that defines the properties to include in the query results.

value.span: 用來建立 ORDER BY 子句的參數。

span.span: The parameters that are used for creating the ORDER BY clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性控制項包含表示 Entity SQL 查詢的陳述式的字串。The property of the control contains a string that represents the statement of an Entity SQL query. 這可讓您預測一組指定的查詢所傳回物件的屬性。This enables you to project a specified set of properties from the objects returned by the query. 這個字串會傳遞，而不需修改，為執行由[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]。This string is passed, without modification, to the that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]. 此查詢是藉由調節資料的來源控制項。This query is the source of the data regulated by the control. 若要提供字串屬性使用相同的格式為傳遞給字串方法。The string supplied to the property uses the same format as the string that is passed to the method of . 如需如何使用子句來定義查詢投影的範例，請參閱[如何： 執行查詢，傳回匿名類型的物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3b264025-e911-4d73-90ce-992d2b9d189d)。For examples of how to use the clause to define a projection for a query, see [How to: Execute a Query that Returns Anonymous Type Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3b264025-e911-4d73-90ce-992d2b9d189d). 預計的資料不支援更新。Updates are not supported for projected data. 這表示當您使用屬性，以指定的投影，繫結的資料繫結不支援更新。This means that when you use the property to specify a projection, the bound data binding does not support updates. 當您定義投影啟用分頁時，您必須定義排序結果所依據的屬性。When you define a projection with paging enabled, you must define the property by which to order the results. 這表示當您設定屬性來定義投影，具有設`true`，您也必須設定屬性來定義的順序，或設定屬性`true`並加入訂單依參數集合。This means the when you set the property to defined a projection and have set to `true`, you must also set the property to define the order or set the property to `true` and add an ORDER BY parameter to the collection. 如果無法設定， ，或已啟用。 cannot be set if , , or is enabled. 如果設為投影的屬性會傳回查詢 (例如， `SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`)、會傳回。If the is set to a query that returns a projection of properties (for example, `SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`), a will be returned. ## Examples 使用下列的 XML 標記屬性來指定投影具有六個產品類型的屬性：The following XML markup uses the property to specify a projection with six of the properties of the Product type: ``` ``` 上述 XML 範例等同於下列名為`products`:The previous XML example is the same as the following named `products`: ``` ObjectQuery products = context.Product .Select(it.[ProductID], it.[Name], it.[ListPrice], it.[Size], it.[Style], it.[Weight]) .OrderBy("it.[ProductID]"); ```

exception.span: 當 屬性指定查詢投影，且 或 的值為 時。

span.span: When the property specifies a query projection and the value of , , or is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Selected As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs)

summary.span: 發生於查詢已執行之後。

span.span: Occurs after a query has been executed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在執行查詢，並在傳回資料之後，就會引發事件。The event is raised after a query has been executed and data has been returned. 如果查詢準備或執行期間發生錯誤時，它也會引發。It is also raised if an error occurred during query preparation or execution. 屬性物件包含的查詢所傳回的物件。The property of the object contains an of objects that are returned from the query. 處理傳回實體中的擷取和儲存的事件。Handle the event to retrieve and store returned entities in the . 這樣做可以保存的頁面上的物件變更。Do this to persist object changes on the page. 屬性物件中所有頁面，不論分頁的資料繫結控制項所傳送的值顯示的物件總數。The property of the object shows the total number of objects in all pages, regardless of the values passed by the data-bound control for paging. 是只擷取資料繫結控制項需要它，例如，如果啟用分頁。 is only retrieved if the data-bound control needs it, such as if paging is enabled. 如果準備或執行查詢時，就會發生錯誤引發事件時，屬性物件設為所傳回，而屬性設定為`null`。If an error occurs when the query is prepared or executed, the event is raised, the property of the object is set to the returned , and the property is set to `null`. 如果您在處理中的例外狀況事件處理常式中，設定屬性`true`。If you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 這可防止再次引發的例外狀況。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 當您指定的值`false`如屬性，重新引發例外狀況。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Selecting As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceSelectingEventArgs)

summary.span: 發生於查詢建構及執行之前。

span.span: Occurs before a query is constructed and executed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構及執行查詢之前，就會引發事件。The event is raised before a query is constructed and executed. 處理修改之設定的事件或讀取或建構及執行查詢之前，變更引數，從資料繫結控制項。Handle the event to modify the configuration of the or read or change the arguments from the data-bound control before the query is constructed and executed. 設定屬性物件`true`以取消查詢。Set the property of the object to `true` to cancel the query. 取消選取的作業時，會不傳回任何資料，資料繫結控制項。When the SELECT operation is canceled, no data is returned to the data-bound control. 如果`AllowPaging`設`true`在資料繫結控制項中，叫用和查詢產生器方法上上使用的值和屬性物件。If `AllowPaging` is set to `true` in the data-bound control, the invokes the and query builder methods on using the values of the and properties of the object. 如果`AllowSorting`設`true`在資料繫結控制項中，的物件可以變更時處理事件。If `AllowSorting` is set to `true` in the data-bound control, the of the object can be changed when the event is handled. 任何其他查詢運算子，例如 WHERE 或 ORDER BY、 網頁標記中指定會在之後套用就會引發事件。Any other query operators, such as WHERE or ORDER BY, that are specified in the page markup are applied after the event is raised.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SelectParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 取得用於建立投影的參數集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that are used to create the projection.

value.span: 用於建立投影的參數。

span.span: The parameters that are used for creating the projection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 像方法類別，參數可以傳遞至所定義的投影屬性。Like the method of the class, parameters can be passed to the projection that is defined by the property. 屬性控制項指定，其中包含要提供資訊給查詢的 SELECT 陳述式的參數。The property of the control specifies a that contains the parameters to supply to the SELECT statement of the query. 屬性用於具名引數提供給字串中所指定的參數是指屬性。The property uses named arguments to refer to the parameters that are specified in the string that is supplied to the property. 如果屬性未設定，由參數替代。If the property is not set, no parameter substitution is made. 在 SELECT 陳述式前面加上的所有參數名稱"`@"`符號`,`必須具有相符名稱。All the parameter names in the SELECT statement, prefixed by the "`@"` symbol`,` must have a matching name in the . 中的參數不允許 null 值。Null values are not allowed for parameters in a .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool StoreOriginalValuesInViewState { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示資料來源的資料是否應在檢視狀態中進行儲存，以確定在更新或刪除資料前，資料未由另一個處理序變更。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the data from the data source should be stored in view state to make sure that the data has not been changed by another process before it is updated or deleted.

value.span: 如果在檢視狀態中儲存值則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the values will be stored in view state; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 追蹤時變更更新和刪除作業都已啟用，控制項必須儲存原始值載入中的物件資訊。To track changes when update and delete operations are enabled, the control must store information about original values of loaded objects in the . 此必要的資訊儲存檢視狀態中，會增加的分頁大小。Storing this required information in the view state will increase the page size. 您可以停用檢視狀態中，儲存原始值，藉由設定屬性`false`。You can disable storing original values in the view state by setting the property to `false`. 如果這樣做，請[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]無法追蹤更新的物件中的並行存取。If you do this, the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] cannot track concurrency in updated objects. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[更新資料 (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ca153eec-6817-4c1d-b262-efd6d35b0246)。For more information, see [Updating Data (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ca153eec-6817-4c1d-b262-efd6d35b0246).

MemberSignature.Value: Custom Event Exception As EventHandler(Of DynamicValidatorEventArgs) Implements System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource
.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Web.UI.WebControls.IQueryableDataSource.RaiseViewChanged() cil managed

summary.span: 告知資料繫結控制項，參數物件已變更，因此需要重新整理資料繫結控制項。

span.span: Notifies the data-bound control that a parameter object has changed and the data-bound control needs to refresh.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void TrackViewState() cil managed

summary.span: 導致對伺服器控制項的檢視狀態變更的追蹤 (Tracking)，以便它們能夠儲存於伺服器控制項的 物件。

span.span: Causes tracking of view-state changes to the server control so they can be stored in the server control's object.

summary.span: 這個物件可透過 屬性存取。

span.span: This object is accessible through the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Updated As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs)

summary.span: 發生於物件變更已保存至資料來源之後。

span.span: Occurs after changes to an object have been persisted to the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時已修改物件的變更會保存到資料來源，或套用變更時，發生錯誤，會引發事件。The event is raised when changes to a modified object are persisted to the data source or if an error has occurred when applying changes. 屬性物件用來存取已修改的物件。The property of the object is used to access the modified object. 此物件的屬性會包含從資料來源，包括任何伺服器產生的值傳回的值。The properties of this object contain values returned from the data source, including any server-generated values. 如果發生錯誤時的變更會保存到資料來源，就會引發事件和屬性物件設為所傳回。If an error occurs when changes are persisted to the data source, the event is raised and the property of the object is set to the returned . 如果您在處理中的例外狀況事件處理常式中，設定屬性`true`。If you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 這可防止再次引發的例外狀況。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 當您指定的值`false`如屬性，重新引發例外狀況。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UpdateParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 取得更新作業期間所使用的參數集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that are used during an update operation.

value.span: 更新作業期間所使用的參數。

span.span: The parameters that are used during an update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 4 或更早版本為目標的 web 應用程式，屬性值會儲存在檢視狀態，並自動回傳之間維護。For web applications that target ASP.NET 4 or earlier, the property value is stored in view state and is automatically maintained between postbacks. ASP.NET 4.5 為目標的 web 應用程式，屬性值不會儲存檢視狀態中，您必須設定每個 HTTP 要求值。For web applications that target ASP.NET 4.5, the property value is not stored in view state, and you must set the value for each HTTP request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Updating As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs)

summary.span: 發生於物件變更保存至資料來源之前。

span.span: Occurs before changes to an object are persisted to the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件屬性變更會保存到資料來源之前，就會引發事件。The event is raised before changes to the properties of an object are persisted to the data source. 事件可讓您修改或驗證之物件的變更、 提供不同的物件，或之前所做的變更會保存取消作業。The event enables you to modify or verify changes to the object, supply a different object, or cancel the operation before the changes are persisted. 您可以存取的已修改的物件，從屬性物件。You can access the modified object from the property of the object. 如果提供不同的物件，使用者會負責設定正確的實體類型屬性。If supplying a different object, the user is responsible for setting the correct entity type in the property. 處理事件，如果您必須修改讓設定不同的原始值的並行存取控制的物件。Handle the event if you must modify the for the object to set different original values for concurrency control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[儲存的變更和管理並行](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e)。For more information, see [Saving Changes and Managing Concurrency](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e). 若要停止從保存的變更，請設定屬性物件`true`。To stop the changes from being persisted, set the property of the object to `true`. 如果發生錯誤時具現化物件或修改屬性，就會引發事件和屬性物件設為所傳回。If an error occurs when instantiating an object or modifying properties, the event is raised and the property of the object is set to the returned . 當您處理中的例外狀況事件處理常式中，設定屬性`true`。When you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 這可防止再次引發的例外狀況。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 當您指定的值`false`如屬性，重新引發例外狀況。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Where { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 Entity SQL 運算式，這個運算式會指定如何篩選查詢結果。

span.span: Gets or sets the Entity SQL expression that specifies how to filter the query results.

value.span: WHERE 子句。

span.span: The WHERE clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性控制項是一個字串，表示是 Entity SQL 查詢的述詞子句。The property of the control is a string that represents a clause that is the predicate of an Entity SQL query. 這個字串會傳遞，而不需修改，為執行由[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]。This string is passed, without modification, to an that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]. 此查詢是藉由調節資料的來源控制項。This query is the source of the data regulated by the control. 若要提供字串屬性使用相同的格式為傳遞給字串方法。The string supplied to the property uses the same format as the string that is passed to the method of . 如需如何使用子句來篩選查詢的範例，請參閱[如何： 篩選資料](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/776f8556-3350-4572-804a-b1513515c1b2)。For examples of how to use the clause to filter a query, see [How to: Filter Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/776f8556-3350-4572-804a-b1513515c1b2). 若要篩選查詢結果所納入方程式實體類型屬性的運算式，請參閱資訊關於屬性。To filter query results by equating an entity type property to an expression, see information about the property. ## Examples XML 標記，在下列範例中，在.aspx 檔案中，從控制項擷取值，並將其傳遞為參數，以屬性。The XML markup in the following example, in an .aspx file, retrieves a value from a control and passes it as a parameter to the property. ``` ``` 上述 XML 範例等同於下列名為`onlineOrders`:The previous XML example is the same as the following named `onlineOrders`: ``` ObjectQuery onlineOrders = context.SalesOrderHeader .Where("it.OnlineOrderFlag = TRUE AND it.TotalDue > @ordercost", new ObjectParameter("ordercost", orderCost)) .OrderBy("it.TotalDue DESC"); ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WhereParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 取得用於建立 WHERE 子句的參數集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that are used to create the WHERE clause.

value.span: 用於建立 WHERE 子句的參數。

span.span: The parameters that are used for creating the WHERE clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 像方法類別，可以指派給此述詞來傳遞參數屬性。Like the method of the class, parameters can be passed to the predicate assigned to the property. 屬性控制項指定，其中包含要提供資訊給查詢的 WHERE 子句的參數。The property of the control specifies a that contains the parameters to supply to the WHERE clause of the query. 屬性用於具名引數提供給字串中所指定的參數是指屬性。The property uses named arguments to refer to the parameters that are specified in the string that is supplied to the property. 如果屬性未設定，由參數替代。If the property is not set, no parameter substitution is made. WHERE 子句中的所有參數名稱前面加都上符號"`@"`必須具有相符名稱。All the parameter names in the WHERE clause preceded by the symbol "`@"` must have a matching name in the . 中的參數不允許 null 值。Null values are not allowed for parameters in a . ## Examples XML 標記，在下列範例中，在.aspx 檔案中，從控制項擷取值，並將其傳遞為參數，以屬性。The XML markup in the following example, in an .aspx file, retrieves a value from a control and passes it as a parameter to the property. ``` ``` 上述 XML 範例等同於下列名為`onlineOrders`:The previous XML example is the same as the following named `onlineOrders`: ``` ObjectQuery onlineOrders = context.SalesOrderHeader .Where("it.OnlineOrderFlag = TRUE AND it.TotalDue > @ordercost", new ObjectParameter("ordercost", orderCost)) .OrderBy("it.TotalDue DESC"); ```
